member.name: T:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient
member.summary: Thin wrapper of the LaunchKey REST API.

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a LaunchKey REST client using app credentials
member.param: RSA private key in PEM-OAEP format
API endpoint to use. Defaults to v1

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.Ping
member.summary: Sends a /ping request to the API, retrieving the current API public key. Called implicitly by other API functions as needed.
member.returns: object including public key for LaunchKey API

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.Authenticate(System.String,LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.AuthenticationType)
member.summary: Begin an authentication cycle for user identified by . Implicitly calls Ping().
member.param: Authentication type, either transaction or session
member.returns: object including unique token for further information about this request

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.Poll(System.String)
member.summary: Poll the status of an authentication request using the reference id supplied in . Implicitly calls Ping().
member.param: unique authentication request reference ID to check

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.Logs(LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LogsAction,LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LogsStatus,System.String)
member.summary: Notify the LaunchKey API of a status change, such as successful or unsuccessful logins or revocations. Implicitly calls .
member.param: Authentication request associated with the action
member.returns: object indicating success or failure of the status update

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.IsAuthorized(System.String,LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.PollResponse)
member.summary: given a object, returns whether the authentication has been approved by a user yet. if the authentication request is approved, makes an implicit call to to update the device status
member.returns: true if the user has approved the authorization, or false if they have not

member.name: M:LaunchKey.SDK.Rest.LaunchKeyRestClient.Logout(System.String)
member.summary: Convenience method for logging out an auth session
